$
Our Story
/$
$
Founded in 2000, Players Waterfront Eatery has a rich history rooted in the heart of our community. Originally known as Players Sports Bar, the restaurant quickly became a favorite gathering spot for friends, families, and food lovers alike.
​
In 2008, the current owners took the helm, bringing with them a vision to transform this beloved establishment into something truly extraordinary. After years of dedication and planning, they embarked on a full building remodel in 2012, completely reimagining the space to better serve our guests. In June 2014, we proudly reopened our doors, unveiling a fresh and inviting ambiance that perfectly complemented our updated menu and mission.
​
Fast forward to 2024, we rebranded as Players Waterfront Eatery, embracing our picturesque waterfront location and elevating the dining experience to new heights. With a focus on a menu that blends timeless favorites with modern culinary creativity, we’re excited to share our passion for great food and warm hospitality.
​
Whether you’re here for a casual lunch, a romantic dinner, or a celebration with friends, we invite you to be part of our story. At Players Waterfront Eatery, every meal is a moment to savor, and every guest is family.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
In the Kitchen
/$
$
At Players Waterfront Eatery, our kitchen is the heart of our family-run restaurant. It’s where simple, high-quality ingredients come together with care and passion to create meals that feel like home. Our small team works side by side, blending generations of cooking know-how with a love for feeding our community.
​
Every dish we make is prepared with thought and care, from the first slice to the final touch. We focus on using trusted ingredients that help us deliver comforting, delicious food. Whether it’s a hearty classic, a seasonal favorite, or one of our signature dishes, each plate is a reflection of the pride we take in what we serve.
​
Our kitchen isn’t just where the food is made—it’s where memories are created. From early mornings to late nights, our family and team pour their hearts into every meal to make sure you feel right at home.
When you dine with us, you’re not just enjoying a meal; you’re joining our family. We can’t wait to share our table with you.

Events
/$
$
Players Waterfront Eatery — Your Perfect Event Space
Looking for a stylish and inviting venue to host your next event? Look no further! At Players Waterfront Eatery, we offer a versatile event space that combines exceptional cuisine and warm hospitality to make your celebration unforgettable.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
$
Perfect for Any Occasion
/$
$
Private Celebrations: Celebrate holiday parties, birthdays, anniversaries, or reunions with family and friends in style.
Rehearsal Dinners: Make your special day even more memorable with a charming venue and exceptional service.
Custom Events: No matter the occasion, our team is ready to bring your unique event to life.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
Event Space Features
/$
$
​
Flexible Seating Arrangements
​​
Private Dining Room
​
Outdoor Patio (Seasonal)
​
Fully Stocked Bar
​
Customizable Menu
Plated Or Buffet Service
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
$
Book Your Event Today!
/$
$
Ready to start planning?

Let Players Waterfront Eatery
be the setting for your next unforgettable event.
